General.Name: Zhejiang Zheneng Electric Power Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Zhejiang Zheneng Electric Power Co., Ltd. engages in thermal power generation business in China and internationally. It also provides thermal products, as well as invests in nuclear power projects. In addition, the company engages in gas power generation and other businesses; coal-fired generation; shipping and port management services; and engineering maintenance, as well as power equipment and engineering, and trading business. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Electric Power Development. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Zheneng Electric Power Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Energy Group Co., Ltd.
